column2: TC-1-P :: Registration
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/
column3:
The site's home page is displayed on the "Postmill" tab.
In the header you can also see: 
- 4 other available tabs: Forums, Wiki, Login and Register.
- a search field
The "Postmill" page contains: Submissions (underlined), Comments, a default filter on "Featured" and a default sort on "Hot".

column2: Click on Sign Up
column3:
A "Sign Up" title page appears.
It contains:
A mandatory "Username" field, followed by a sentence indicating the characters allowed.
A "Password" field followed by another field pasted below "(repeat)" followed by a sentence indicating the expected characteristics.
An optional e-mail address field followed by a sentence indicating that it will only be used to reset the password
A srign up button

column2: Find a new unknown identifier, and enter this username and a password to be repeated twice.
column3: The password is hidden.

column2: Click on Sign up
column3:
Registration works
The Postmill screen reappears.
There's a "Your account has been registered" message at the bottom of the screen.
The header still has the Postmill, Forums and Wiki tabs, as well as the search field. 
The login and register tabs are replaced by a notification tab represented by an "envelope", a "Submit" tab and a tab with the account name (the username used).

column2: Click on the account name dropdown menu and select "Log out".
column3:
The site's home page is displayed on the "Postmill" tab.
In the header you can also see: 
- 4 other available tabs: Forums, Wiki, Login and Sign Up
- a search field
The "Posmill" page contains: Submissions (underlined), Comments, a default filter on "Featured" and a default sort on "Hot".

column2:
Go to the login page
Enter your account details and click on Login
column3:
The connection works.
The postmill tab with the created user account is displayed

column2: Click on the account name and select "My account".
column3:
The user account page appears.
It has a form to change credentials:
 - username
 - password
 - email address
And below a button to delete the account

column2: Click on "Delete this account".
column3:
The delete account page appears.
It warns users of the consequences of deleting their account.
It has a confirm username text input and a confirmation checkbox to make sure users know what they are doing.

column2: Fill the chosen username, check the checkbox and submit the form
column3:
The site's home page is displayed on the "Postmill" tab.
In the header you can also see: 
- 4 other available tabs: Forums, Wiki, Login and Register
- a search field
The "Posmill" page contains: Submissions (underlined), Comments, a default filter on "Featured" and a default sort on "Hot".

column2: TC-2-P :: Registration - Errors
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/
column3:
The site's home page is displayed on the "Postmill" tab.
In the header you can also see: 
- 4 other available tabs: Forums, Wiki, Login and Register
- a search field
The "Posmill" page contains: Submissions (underlined), Comments, a default filter on "Featured" and a default sort on "Hot".

column2: Click on Sign Up
column3:
A "Sign Up" title page appears.
It contains:
A mandatory "Username" field, followed by a sentence indicating the characters allowed.
A "Password" field followed by another field pasted below "(repeat)" followed by a sentence indicating the expected characteristics.
An optional e-mail address field followed by a sentence indicating that it will only be used to reset the password
A srign up button

column2: Enter "MarvelsGrantMan136" as identifier
column3: The identifier is displayed

column2: Enter a password for the prerequisite account
column3: The password is added, but it is not possible to see it. Each character is represented by a dot.

column2: Enter the same password in the Repeat field
column3: Same behaviour as for the first password field

column2: Click on "Sign up"
column3:
Registration does not work.
The screen is reset with a message above the user field "this value is already used".

column2: Enter a login that does not yet exist, then click on the "Register" button.
column3:
The page displayed remains unchanged except for the password field, which is framed in red.
Password field selected

column2: Enter only the password field with a valid password, then click on "Register".
column3:
The page displayed remains the same, except that the "Repeat" password field is framed in red.
Password field selected

column2: Enter a pair of invalid passwords such as "Yahou15" (7 characters) then click on Register
column3:
Password fields are empty.
A message "This value is too short. It should have 8 characters or more." is displayed.

column2: Enter 2 different valid passwords and click on Register
column3:
Password fields are cleared.
An "This value is not valid" message is displayed.

column2: Enter the same valid passwords and an invalid e-mail address (e.g. "plop@123.") then click on Register
column3:
Registration is not complete.
The page information is still present
A message asking you to enter a valid address is displayed.

column2: Delete the information in the e-mail address field and click on "Register".
column3: Registration works

column2: TC-3-P :: Profile
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Click on the header dropdown menu with the account name
column3:
A list is displayed.
It contains:
- Profile
- My Account
- User Settings
- Block list
- Dark mode
- Logout

column2: Click on "Profile"
column3:
A Page with a list of posts is displayed
It contains, under the header, 3 tabs:
- Overview
- Submissions
- Comments
The Overview tab is the one displayed

column2: Click on "Overview" and "Submissions".
column3: Tabs displayed correctly

column2: TC-4-P :: Account
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and click on Sign Up
column3:
A "Sign Up" title page appears.
It contains:
A mandatory "Username" field, followed by a sentence indicating the characters allowed.
A "Password" field followed by another field pasted below "(repeat)" followed by a sentence indicating the expected characteristics.
An optional e-mail address field followed by a sentence indicating that it will only be used to reset the password
A sign up button

column2: Find a new unknown identifier, and enter this username and a valid password to be repeated twice.
column3: The identifier is displayed

column2: Enter valid e-mail address for prerequisites
column3: The e-mail address is correct

column2: Click on sign up
column3:
Registration works
The Postmill screen reappears.
There's a "Your account has been created" message at the bottom of the screen.
The header still has the Postmill, Forums and Wiki tabs, as well as the search field. 
The login and register tabs are replaced by a notification tab represented by an "envelope", a "Post" tab and a tab with the account name (the username used).

column2: Click on the header "button" with the account name
column3:
A list is displayed.
It contains:
- Profile
- My Account
- User Settings
- Block list
- Dark mode
- Logout

column2: Click on "My account"
column3:
An "Editing user John_Le_Duc" page is displayed.
It contains 
- Credentials (username, new password (with confirmation) and e-mail address, all of which can be modified)
- A "Save changes" button
- A "Delete account" section with a "Delete this account" button

column2: Change user name and confirm
column3:
The page title is updated with the new account name
A message indicating that the account has been updated is displayed".

column2: Log out and log back in with new credentials
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed, the user is logged in with the new credentials

column2: Return to "My account" and delete the account
column3:
A "Delete account" page is displayed, showing the actions involved in deleting the account.
A message indicating that a deletion is definitive is also displayed.

column2: Fill in the account details, validate the checkbox and click on the delete button.
column3:
Return to the "Postmill" page while not logged in.
A message indicating account deletion is displayed

column2: Login with delete account
column3: Connection failure with "Invalid credentials" message

column2: TC-5-P :: Settings
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column3:
A list is displayed.
It contains:
- Profile
- My Account
- User Settings
- Block list
- Dark mode
- Logout

column2: Click on "User Settings"
column3:
A "Editing user settings for MarvelsGrantMan136" title page is displayed.
It contains several sections:
- General
- Posting
- Notifications
- Privacy
- Appearance
and a "Save changes" button

column2: In the "General" section, select "New" in Home Page instead of "Hot" (or vice versa), then click on the "Save changes" button.
column3:
The page remains displayed.
A message confirming that the changes have been taken into account is displayed.

column2: Go to "Postmill" page
column3: In the rightmost tab, the value chosen (New or Hot) in the previous step is displayed.

column2: Click on Dark mode

column2: TC-8-P :: Submission
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Click on the "Submit" tab
column3:
the "Create submission" page appears. It contains:
- a URL / Image field
- A title (mandatory)
- A body with "Markdown allowed" below and a link to syntax references
- A mandatory "Forum" drop-down list
- A create submission button

column2: Fill in the title field with: The tester's tavern
column3: The title is filled in

column2: Select "science" in Forum, then click on "Create submission".
column3:
The post is created
A page is displayed with the post and below the comments

column2: Add a comment and confirm
column3: The comment is added

column2: Delete the comment and submission
column3: The page is redirected to the /f/science forum

column2: TC-9-P :: Post with URL
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Click on the header "button" with the account name
column3:
A list is displayed.
It contains:
- Profile
- My Account
- User Settings
- Block list
- Dark mode
- Logout

column2: Clik on "User setting" in the user dropdown menu
column3: A page "Editing user setting" is displayed

column2: In the "General" section, select "Open The linked content" for "when clicking submission links..." option, then save.
column3:
The page remains displayed.
A message confirming that the changes have been taken into account is displayed.

column2: Click on the "Submit" tab
column3:
the "Create submission" page appears. It contains:
- a URL / Image field
- A title (mandatory)
- A body with "Markdown allowed" below and a link to syntax references
- A mandatory "Forum" drop-down list
- A create a post button

column2: Enter the following in the URL field: https://latavernedutesteur.fr/
column3: The URL is filled in

column2: Fill the title field with: La taverne du testeur URL
column3: The title is filled in

column2: Select "science" in Forum, then click on "Create a post".
column3:
The post is created
A page is displayed with the post and below the comments

column2: Click on the post title
column3: The Tester's Tavern blog page is displayed

column2: Return to the previous page
column3: The submission about the Tester's Tavern URL is displayed

column2: Delete the submission
column3: The page is redirected to the /f/science forum

column2: Click on the header "button" with the account name and click on "User settings"
column3: The user setting page is displayed

column2: In the "General" section, select "Open the submission" for "when clicking submission links..." option, then save.
column3:
The page remains displayed.
A message confirming that the changes have been taken into account is displayed.

column2: TC-11-P :: Forum
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Go to the Forums tab
column3:
A page with the title "list of forums" is displayed. It contains:
Forums", "Tags" and "Alphabetical" tabs.
The list is displayed by 25, beyond that there is a pagination

column2: Search for the AskReddit  forum
column3: This forum is present in the page with a "subscribe" button like the other forums

column2: Click on the "Tags" tab
column3: A specific page with the title "Tags" is displayed

column2: Click on Alphabetical
column3:
A page with the title "All forums" is displayed.
It contains all the forum names sorted by letter

column2: Click on a forum name on the page
column3: The forum page opens

column2: TC-12-P :: Creating a forum
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Go to the Forum tab
column3:
A page with the title "list of forums" is displayed. It contains:
Forums", "Tags" and "Alphabetical" tabs.
The list is displayed by 25, beyond that there is a pagination

column2: Click on the "Create forum" button
column3:
A "Create new forum" page is displayed.
It contains:
- a mandatory name field
- a mandatory title field
- A mandatory description field
- a sidebar field with, as for the "Post body" field, a markdown below it
An optional Tags field
- A create forum button

column2: Enter the information with typical forum value and click on the "Create forum" button
column3:
The forum is created
Its dedicated page is displayed

column2: Click on "Delete Forum"
column3:
A delete forum confirmation page is displayed.
It asks the user to confirm by entering the name of the forum

column2: Enter the name of the forum, check the confirmation box and delete it
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: TC-13-P :: Wiki - creating a new page
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Go to the "Wiki" tab
column3:
A page with the wiki title is displayed
It contains the title Page not found with a Create this page button under it
It also contains 1 sections on the right:
- Navigation with: All pages, Recent changes and "Create new page".

column2: Click on "Create this page"
column3:
A page with the title "Create a new page" is displayed.
It contains:
- a mandatory URL field pre-filled with "index" and non-modifiable
- a mandatory title field
- a mandatory "Body" field with "Mardown allowed. Syntax reference +" below, as for other forms
- A save button

column2: Create values to fill in the fields and click on "Save".
column3:
A page with the wiki title is displayed
It contains under the title: 
- information from the index page
It also contains 3 sections on the right:
- Index 
- Toolbox with Edit page and Page history
- Navigation with: All pages, Recent changes and "Create new page".

column2: TC-14-P :: Wiki - Modify page
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: Go to the "Wiki" tab
column3:
A page with the wiki title is displayed
It contains the title Page not found with a Create this page button under it
It also contains 1 sections on the right:
- Navigation with: All pages, Recent changes and "Create new page".

column2: Click on "Create this page"
column3:
A page with the title "Create a new page" is displayed.
It contains:
- a mandatory URL field pre-filled with "index" and non-modifiable
- a mandatory title field
- a mandatory "Body" field with "Mardown allowed. Syntax reference +" below, as for other forms
- A save button

column2: Create values to fill in the fields and click on "Save".
column3:
A page with the wiki title is displayed
It contains under the title: 
- information from the index page
It also contains 3 sections on the right:
- Index 
- Toolbox with Edit page and Page history
- Navigation with: All pages, Recent changes and "Create new page".

column2: Click on "Edit page".
column3:
An index title page is displayed
It contains:
- a mandatory title field pre-filled with the page title
- A mandatory "Body" field with "Mardown allowed. Syntax reference +" underneath, as with other forms, and pre-filled with the initial content.
- A save button

column2: Make changes and click on the "Save" button
column3:
The modified page is displayed with the changes made.
The "Index" field indicates that a modification has just been made.

column2: TC-16-P :: 1st Comment - no URL
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: From the Postmill page find posts with the "All" filter
column3: Posts without URLs are present

column2: Click on the title of a post without URL
column3: The post page opens with a comment field

column2: Add a comment and click on "Post".
column3: The Post is displayed with the comment made and the possibility to "reply", create a Permalink, delete or modify it.

column2: Delete the newly created comment
column3: The comment disappeared from the list of comments

column2: TC-17-P :: reply to comment - no URL
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: From the Postmill page find posts with the "All" filter
column3: Posts without URL and with comments from another account are present

column2: Click on the title of a post without URL and with comments
column3:
The post page opens with a comment field and the previous comment(s).
You can create a permalink or reply to existing comments.

column2: Reply to a comment and click on "Post".
column3: The Post is displayed with the comment made and the possibility to "reply", create a Permalink, delete or modify it.

column2: Click on reply to a comment
column3: A text field (with the info below Markdown) is displayed, with a "Post" button below it.

column2: Enter an answer and click on "Post".
column3: The Post is displayed with the reply to the comment made and the option to "reply", create a Permalink, delete or modify it.

column2: Delete the reply that were just created
column3: The reply disappeared from the list of comments

column2: TC-18-P :: Comment URL
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to the site http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9999/ and log in with account MarvelsGrantMan136 / test1234
column3: The Postmill tab is displayed

column2: From the Postmill page find posts with the "All / Most commented / All time" filter
column3: Posts with URLs are present

column2: Click on the text "X comment(s)" of a post with URL where X is the number of comments in the post.
column3:
The post is displayed with all its comments, if any.
A "Comments" field for creating a new comment and a "Post" button are available.
